segments.text: Just a minute . It's ten to nine by my watch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it ? I had no idea it was so late . I must be off now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I must catch the nine-thirty train .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You've plenty of time yet . The railway station is very close . It won't take more than twenty minutes to get there .
segments.speaker: S2
